title: Squad wishes Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez happy birthday
text:
Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez's squad have flooded social media with happy birthday messages for the congresswoman as she celebrated turning 30 in Denmark.

The socialist congresswoman spent her birthday in Denmark on Sunday after attending the C40 World Mayors Summit.

She took to Twitter to thank those who had wished her a happy birthday, saying she was enjoying the 'social democracy' in the Scandinavian country.

'Thank you everyone for the birthday wishes!' the New York representative tweeted alongside a video of her walking across a pond.

Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez spent her birthday in Denmark on Sunday after attending the C40 World Mayors Summit

AOC took to Twitter to thank those who had wished her a happy birthday, saying she was enjoying the 'social democracy' in the Scandinavian country

'Spending the day in Denmark after C40, enjoying this social democracy that treats healthcare & education as rights, zero-carbon as priority, & infrastructure as a key public good. Here's to another year of fighting for our future.'

Among those to acknowledge AOC's birthday were her fellow congresswomen and members of the so-called 'squad'.

Massachusetts Rep. Ayanna Pressley tweeted several photos of her with AOC in congress with a lengthy message saying she was grateful she was born.

'So grateful you were born sister. Inspired by your truth telling, justice seeking, and love for the NY 14th,' she wrote.

So grateful you were born sister. Inspired by your truth telling, justice seeking, and love for the NY 14th. Fortunate to learn with you, laugh with you, pray with you, work with you. Wishing you a wonderful day filled with love & Riley get our girl that puppy already ♥️ @AOC pic.twitter.com/jtWuqUe1jN — Ayanna Pressley (@AyannaPressley) October 13, 2019

Happiness of birthdays to you sis @AOC, it’s been an honor to serve with you in our fight for a more just world 💪🏽 pic.twitter.com/7JK7olwkHd — Ilhan Omar (@IlhanMN) October 13, 2019

'Fortunate to learn with you, laugh with you, pray with you, work with you. Wishing you a wonderful day filled with love & Riley get our girl that puppy already.'

Michigan's Rashida Tlaib also shared a photo of the pair together with the hastag #HappyBirthdayAOC.

'So blessed to be serving with you sis. You inspire me with your passion and commitment. Love you @AOC!' she tweeted.

Ilhan Omar tweeted: 'Happiness of birthdays to you sis @AOC, it’s been an honor to serve with you in our fight for a more just world.'

Washington's Pramila Jayapal also tweeted a happy birthday message, saying: 'Wishing my fabulous friend @AOC a very happy birthday - every day, I am grateful for the energy, passion and intelligence you bring to Congress and our work.'
description: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez spent her birthday  in Denmark on Sunday after attending the C40 World Mayors Summit.
